from_the_depths.gui.structure.facing.pla: 注意：如果你面向北邊的話，選擇南方會使建築朝向你。
from_the_depths.gui.structure.nobuild: 區域內有被保護的方塊，無法建造結構。
from_the_depths.gui.preview.notice: 對任何方塊點擊滑鼠右鍵可解除預覽。
item.from_the_depths:totem.name: Totem
from_the_depths.messages.early_summon: Cannot spawn a monster now, try again later.
from_the_depths.messages.invalid_arena: Cannot summon monster. The area around the altar must only be air in a square radius of %d blocks and height of %d blocks
from_the_depths.messages.invalid_arena_g: Cannot summon monster. The ground around the altar must be solid blocks in a square radius of %d blocks
from_the_depths.messages.boss_entity_not: Can't Find Boss Entity with name '%s' in mod '%s'
from_the_depths.messages.peaceful_mode: The current world difficulty is set to Peaceful. Unable to summon boss or minions
from_the_depths.restrictions.dimension: The boss can't be spawned in this dimension.
from_the_depths.restrictions.time_of_day: The boss can't be spawned during this time of the day.
from_the_depths.restrictions.weather: The boss can only be spawned with a %s weather.
from_the_depths.restrictions.biomes: The boss can only be spawned in the following biomes: %s.
from_the_depths.restrictions.y_level_low: The boss can only be spawned deeper underground at a Y level lower than %d.
from_the_depths.restrictions.y_level_hig: The boss can only be spawned higher than a Y level of %d.
from_the_depths.restrictions.y_level_equ: The boss can only be at the exact height of %d.
from_the_depths.restrictions.ground_radi: This boss needs a flat ground area of %d blocks radius.
from_the_depths.restrictions.season: This boss can only be spawned during %s season.
